items.text: length outside off, blocked on the front foot

items.text: length and angled in at off stump, punched to long-off on the back foot
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, dropped into the leg side with soft hands
items.shortText: Santner to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: floaty length ball, drifting in at off stump. Blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: flat and pushed down leg side. Gets just inside the line and tickles this fine
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: overpitched on leg stump, flicked to deep square
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Neesham to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: shot. But only one. Dropped short outside off and punched firmly off the back foot to sweeper's left
items.shortText: Neesham to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: short ball wide outside off. Beaten on the pull
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length ball cutting in from middle stump. Looks to flick, cops it on the pad
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length and wide outside off, beaten on the slash
items.shortText: Neesham to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, tapped into the covers off the back foot
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: well done. Big stride down the pitch and a clean swing on the slog sweep. Length at middle, gets the leg just leg side of the line of the ball and picks it up over deep midwicket
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, SIX runs

items.text: length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: overpitched outside off, looks to drive, can't beat extra cover's dive to the left
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: tossed up wide outside off. Gets down, reaches out, and paddles it to short fine's right
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, whipped straight to midwicket off the back foot
items.postText: Imam: "As much I loved watching that innings against India, it was not actually "thrashing". He scored 51 at a strike rate close to 100. By that logic, both Soumya and Sabbir have "thrashed" quite a few teams. It is just the fact that back then we were happy with a player scoring an occasional fifty and one or two wins against top tier teams."

items.text: slower ball at a length on middle stump. Shuffles across and tickles this fine. He was right in front of middle stump as he played this
